title: Hour 2: Jerry Jones takes the Stage
description:
Jerry Jones jumps on the set to battle it out with Stephen A. The crew talks Tyron Smith's injury, Mike McCarthy, and how the offense should/will look this season. Plus the "Playmaker" Michael Irvin and Marcus Spears gives their top 5 stars in the NFL.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
